channel.title: Python on IYP UK
channel.description: Recent content in Python on IYP UK

item.title: TDD Django Docker
item.description: What you will learn here We will go through the current Django tutorial with a particular focus on TDD and using Docker. This tutorial presents a polls application. Prerequisites Check you have the required software on your machine. $ docker -v Docker version 17.09.0-ce, build afdb6d4 $ docker-compose -v docker-compose version 1.16.1, build 6d1ac21 Getting started We will be running Django along with a PostgreSQL database.

item.title: Docker Compose Python Eve Mongodb
item.description: PyCharm As a Python developer you are probably familiar with PyCharm, an amazing IDE from JetBrains. If you don’t know anything about it, have a look, you’ll probably not regret it :) Some of the steps in this article will make mention of PyCharm, however, it’s not required and you can still follow if you’re using another IDE. If you’re not using any IDE, well, god save your soul.
